solution.text:
Let the ages be \(_{j}_x\) and \(_{k}_x\) where \(x\) is a variable.
According to question
\(\Rightarrow \frac {_{j}_x+_{{k-(3*j)}}_}{_{k}_x+_{{k-(3*j)}}_}=\frac13\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{3*j}}_x+3(_{{k-(3*j)}}_)=_{k}_x+_{{k-(3*j)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{(3*j)-k}}_x=-2(_{{k-(3*j)}}_)\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{k-(3*j)}}_x=2(_{{k-(3*j)}}_)\)
\(\Rightarrow x=\frac {2(_{{k-(3*j)}}_)}{_{{k-(3*j)}}_}\)
\(\Rightarrow x=2\)
Therefore, Sachi's age is \(_{{2*k}}_\) years.
